landing_subtitle: Join a community of book lovers. Trade your read books for new adventures and support local bookstores in the process.
how_it_works_subtitle: Swapping books is as easy as 1-2-3.
how_it_works_step1_desc: Browse books available in your city. Add your favorite books to your wishlist.
how_it_works_step2_desc: Found a book you want? Propose a swap with one of your available books.
how_it_works_step3_desc: Meet at a partner library to safely exchange your books using a unique swap code.
features_subtitle: We're more than just a platform; we're a community built on the love for reading and local culture.
features_item1_desc: Access a diverse collection of books from readers all over your city.
features_item2_desc: Connect with fellow book lovers and support local independent bookstores.
features_item3_desc: Discover new authors and genres without spending a fortune. Your next favorite book is a swap away.
join_subtitle: Sign up today and start your next reading adventure. It's free to join!
login_subtitle: Welcome back! Please enter your details to sign in.
signup_subtitle: Join the community. Create your account to start swapping.
